explanation: [0-0] A young boy with curly blond hair, wearing a white shirt with a blue dinosaur pattern, stands in a room, his eyes looking forward and his mouth open. In the background, a Christmas tree decorated with colorful lights and red and gold ornaments is visible. Near the wall behind him, there is a white cabinet with some items on it.
[0-4] Then the boy lowers his head slightly and speaks. He then raises his left index finger and opens his eyes wide, his mouth agape in surprise as he looks upwards.

[4-6] The boy suddenly turns and runs to the right. As he runs, the surroundings appear to move to the left. He then runs into a kitchen where a woman in black clothes is busy at the stove, her eyes looking in his direction. Black cabinets can be seen in the kitchen, the countertop is cluttered with items, toys are scattered on the floor, and the boy stops beside the toys.
